Title: The Garden of Words
Actors: Miyu Irino, Kana Hanazawa, Fumi Hirano, Gou Maeda
Plot: Takao, who is training to become a shoemaker, skipped school and is sketching shoes in a Japanese-style garden. He meets a mysterious woman, Yukino, who is older than him. Then, without arranging the times, the two start to see each other again and again, but only on rainy days.
